biography.bio: Christian Quadflieg was born on April 11, 1945 in Växjö, Kronobergs län, Sweden as Christian Urs Quadflieg. He is an actor and director, known for Vater wider Willen (1995), Eine öffentliche Affäre (2001) and Der Preis der Schönheit (2000). He has been married to Renate Reger since 1974.
biography.name: Christian Quadflieg

biography.bio: Ulrike Kriener was born on December 24, 1954 in Bottrop, Germany. She is an actress, known for Kommissarin Lucas (2003), Men... (1985) and Reise in die Nacht (1998). She has been married to Georg Weber since 1992. They have two children.
biography.name: Ulrike Kriener

biography.bio: Bernadette Heerwagen was born on June 22, 1977 in Bonn, Germany. She is an actress, known for Les jours à venir (2010), Gruber geht (2015) and À la frontière (2007). She is married to Ole Puppe. They have one child.
biography.name: Bernadette Heerwagen

biography.bio: Ulrike Grote was born on July 8, 1963 in Bremen, West Germany. She is an actress and director, known for Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf - Die Serie (2013), Was wenn der Tod uns scheidet? (2008) and Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf (2012).
biography.name: Ulrike Grote

biography.bio: Gerhard Garbers was born on August 24, 1942 in Hamburg, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Doppelter Einsatz (1994), Adelheid und ihre Mörder (1993) and Mostly Martha (2001).
biography.name: Gerhard Garbers

biography.bio: Joachim Dietmar Mues was born on December 21, 1945 in Dresden, Germany. He was an actor, known for Die Bubi Scholz Story (1998), The Odessa File (1974) and Der Aufstieg - Ein Mann geht verloren (1980). He died on March 12, 2011 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Joachim Dietmar Mues

biography.bio: Rolf Becker was born on March 31, 1935 in Leipzig, Germany. He is an actor, known for In aller Freundschaft (1998), M. Kaplan (2014) and Gloomy Sunday (1999). He has been married to Sylvia Wempner since 1980. They have three children. He was previously married to Monika Hansen.
biography.name: Rolf Becker

biography.birthName: Daniel César Martín Brühl González Domingo
biography.bio: Daniel Brühl was born in Barcelona, Spain. His father was German TV director Hanno Brühl (1937-2010), who was born in São Paulo, Brazil. His Spanish mother was a teacher. He also has a brother and a sister, Oliver and Miriam. Shortly after his birth, his family moved to Cologne, Germany, where he grew up and attended the Dreikönigsgymnasium. Brought up in a fully multilingual home, he speaks fluent German, English, Portuguese, Spanish, French and Catalan.
biography.name: Daniel Brühl

biography.bio: Ulrich Faulhaber was born on May 3, 1941 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Fear of Fear (1975), Die Reise (1965) and Der Graue (1965).
biography.name: Ulrich Faulhaber

biography.bio: Natascha Graf was born in 1964 in Teheran, Iran as Natascha Aghfurian. She is an actress, known for Curiosity & the Cat (1999), Die Stunde der Offiziere (2004) and Tanners letzte Chance (2002).
biography.name: Natascha Graf

biography.bio: Konstantin Graudus was born on August 4, 1965 in Gütersloh, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Konstantin Erich Wilhelm Graudus. He is an actor, known for Doppelter Einsatz (1994), Les aventures de Klaus aux commandes du chariot élévateur (2000) and Antibodies (2005).
biography.name: Konstantin Graudus

biography.bio: Markus Hering was born on April 26, 1960 in Siegen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Amen (2002), Gloomy Sunday (1999) and Whisky avec vodka (2009).
biography.name: Markus Hering

biography.bio: Peer Jäger was born on July 2, 1943 in Germany. He is an actor, known for Notruf Hafenkante (2007), Späte Rache (2001) and Free Rainer (2007). He has been married to Manon Straché since 1993.
biography.name: Peer Jäger

biography.bio: Heta Mantscheff was born on May 12, 1948 in Cologne, Germany. She is a casting director and actress, known for The Counterfeiters (2007), Sous la ville (2011) and Mostly Martha (2001).
biography.name: Heta Mantscheff

biography.bio: Jona Mues was born on April 7, 1981 in Hamburg, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008), Die Katze von Altona (2002) and Fleisch ist mein Gemüse (2008).
biography.name: Jona Mues
